N <- 1e6

Roulette <- data.frame(Colour = c("Red","Black")[ceiling(2*runif(N))] )

Roulette <- Roulette %>% mutate(
Run = data.table::rleid(Colour)
        ) %>%
        group_by(Run) %>% 
        mutate(Seq = seq_along())

Roulette <- Roulette %>% 
         arrange(desc(Seq)) %>% 
         slice(1)

Roulette %>% janitor::tabyl(Seq)
